title: Riak Recap for August 26 - 28
description:
Posted on August 29, 2011

Evening, Morning, Afternoon to All -

A few blog posts, jobs, and a small README update for today’s Recap.

Enjoy.

Mark

Riak Recap for August 26 – 28

  1. Lengthy blog post about Riak Usage Patterns (in Russian).
    → Read here
  2. Great blog post Analyzing Apache Logs with Riak’s MapReduce.
    → Read here
  3. The merge_index README got some small but valuable updates from rampage.
    → Pull request here
  4. A few great jobs to pass along:
    → Sencha is looking for a Cloud Services DevOps Engineer in Redwood City, CA, to work with Riak and a whole slew of other cool technologies. Details here.
    → SEOMoz is hiring a Test Lead in the Seattle Area to with Riak and Cassandra experience. Details here.
